description: Ensure all required credentials are available for provisioning
steps: Check for Anthropic API key: query AgentMemory vault or env var ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
If not found: prompt user to provide Anthropic API key
Store Anthropic key securely (AgentMemory vault preferred, fallback to encrypted file)
Verify key format: should start with 'sk-ant-'
Test key validity: make a minimal API call if possible
Document where key is stored in instances/credentials-map.json
outputs: Anthropic API key verified and stored securely
